00012 namespace LibTIM {
00014 
00017 template<class T>
00018 class OrderedQueue
00019 {
00020         typedef std::map<int, std::queue<T>, std::less<int> > TorderedQueue;
00021         public:
00023                 OrderedQueue()  { }
00024                 ~OrderedQueue()  { }
00025 
00026     // TorderedQueue is a std::map, so copy ctor, egality test are provided by std::map class
00027         
00028                 
00030                 void put(int order, T _val) { m_oq[order].push(_val); }
00031 
00032                 
00034         T get() { T val;
00035               typename  TorderedQueue::iterator itermap=m_oq.begin();
00036               std::queue<T> *q=&(itermap->second);
00037               val=q->front();
00038               q->pop();
00039               if (q->empty()) m_oq.erase(itermap);
00040               return val;
00041             }
00042   
00044         bool empty() { return m_oq.empty();}
00045 
00046   private :
00047      TorderedQueue m_oq;        
00048 };

00090 class Queue
00091 {
00092   public:
00093   Queue()  { }
00094 
00096   void put(T _t) { m_q.push(_t); }
00098   T get() { T val=m_q.front(); m_q.pop(); return val; }
00100   bool empty() { return m_q.empty();}
00101
